extends org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.ProcessFunction<MRecord,Void>

      • processElement

        public void processElement(MRecord value,
                           org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.ProcessFunction.Context ctx,
                           org.apache.flink.util.Collector<Void> out)
        Process one element from the input stream.

        This function can output zero or more elements using the Collector parameter and also update internal state or set timers using the Context parameter.

        Specified by:
        processElement in class org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.ProcessFunction<MRecord,Void>
        Parameters:
        value - The input value.
        ctx - A Context that allows querying the timestamp of the element and getting a TimerService for registering timers and querying the time. The context is only valid during the invocation of this method, do not store it.
        out - The collector for returning result values.
